title: Is it a Hoax or is it Real
itunes:title: Is it a Hoax or is it Real
description:
Today on the show we had Reverend Al Sharpton call in where he spoke about American's Crossroad, accountability and his new book " Rise Up". Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a woman that felt the need to comment on Nicki Minaj first child. Also, with the latest news of our celebrity and chief Donald Trump testing positive for Corona Virus, many thing that it is a ploy and theres another agenda to that report, so we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
